description: The Department of Public Works and Government Services on behalf of Transport Canada has requirement for Collaborative Soft Seating to be delivered and installed by April 24th, 2024.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Notice
#### Title: T8082-230152_C Purchase of Collaborative Furniture (Soft Seating) for Hybrid Project

**Reference Number:** WS4231653058-Doc4434311370
**Publication Date:** February 14, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** March 1, 2024, at 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time (EST)

**Description:** The Government of Canada, on behalf of the Department of Transport, is soliciting bids for the purchase and installation of collaborative furniture, specifically soft seating, for a Hybrid Project. The descriptive specifications for these services are outlined below.

**Description of Requirements:**

* Guest Seating
* Lounge Seating
* Benches

**Expected Contract Dates:**
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** March 20, 2024
- **Expected Contract End Date:** May 30, 2025

**Bidding Instructions:**

Please submit required supporting documentation and bids to [CanadaBuys](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tenders) and/or (https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18791944?extsite=MTg3OTE5NDRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) no later than March 1, 2024, at 2:00 PM (EST).

**Modification to Closing Time:**
Please disregard the deadline time posted on Ariba Discovery or CanadaBuys. Ensure to submit your bids on time or they will be declared non-responsive.

**Trade Agreements:**

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contact Information:**

Please direct any inquiries to:

Finnigan, Christopher
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
(613)  xxx-xxxx
christopher.finnigan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
